dict.acceptation: 为…提供床位；提供住宿；以睡觉打发日子；

sent.orig: Illusionist: Sleep-Mesmerize effect can now affect Epic targets.
sent.trans: Illu:Sleep造成的催眠效果将能作用在Epic级目标上。

sent.orig: This includes system calls such as alarm, getitimer, and sleep.
sent.trans: 这包括诸如alarm,getitimer,和sleep等系统调用。

sent.orig: Just sleep and sleep and eat andand fuss and sleep again.
sent.trans: 大觉，只是饱食终日，无所用心，吃了睡，睡了吃。

sent.orig: Just sleep and sleep, and eat and play and fuss and sleep again.
sent.trans: 我们却在睡大觉，只是饱食终日，无所用心，吃了睡，睡了吃。

sent.orig: Ritanserincan?t restore to normal sleep except light sleep in sleep deprived rats pretreated with PCPA.
sent.trans: 对于PCPA化使 3种睡眠成分均明显减少 ，觉醒比例明显增加的大鼠 ，ritanserin仅使浅睡眠增加其它成分不变。
